subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish, who lost to another former No. 1, Roger Federer, in the final here last year, will face Andy Murray, whom he has defeated in their last three meetings, Saturday in the semifinals.
snippet: Mardy Fish, who lost to another former No. 1, Roger Federer, in the final here last year, will face Andy Murray, whom he has defeated in their last three meetings, Saturday in the semifinals.
